mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE (SCHEDULE_NO, DEPT_CODE, USER_NO, SCHEDULE_TYPE, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, START_DATE, END_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_SCHNO.NEXTVAL,#{deptCode},#{userNo},#{scheduleType},#{scheduleTitle},#{scheduleContent},#{startDate},#{endDate})
mapper.select: SELECT S.SCHEDULE_NO, S.DEPT_CODE, USER_NAME, S.SCHEDULE_TITLE, S.SCHEDULE_CONTENT, S.SCHEDULE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE+1,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, S.STATUS FROM SCHEDULE S JOIN MEMBER M USING(USER_NO) WHERE SCHEDULE_TYPE ='DS' AND S.STATUS = 'Y' AND S.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET USER_NO = #{userNo}, SCHEDULE_TITLE = #{scheduleTitle}, SCHEDULE_CONTENT = #{scheduleContent}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND SCHEDULE_NO = #{scheduleNo}
mapper.select: SELECT DOC_NO, USER_NAME AS WORK_RECEIVER , LEAVE_TYPE AS LEAVE_CODE, JOB_NAME AS LEAVE_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE FROM LEAVE L JOIN MEMBER ON(USER_NO = LEAVE_WRITER) JOIN WORK_TYPE USING (LEAVE_CODE) JOIN JOB USING(JOB_CODE) WHERE L.DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode} AND L.STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT SCHEDULE_NO,USER_NO, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, SCHEDULE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE+1,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_TYPE =#{scheduleType} AND STATUS ='Y'
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET USER_NO = #{userNo}, SCHEDULE_TITLE = #{scheduleTitle}, SCHEDULE_CONTENT = #{scheduleContent}, START_DATE = #{startDate}, END_DATE = #{endDate}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND SCHEDULE_NO = #{scheduleNo} AND SCHEDULE_TYPE = #{scheduleType} AND DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode}
mapper.select: SELECT SCHEDULE_NO, SCHEDULE_TITLE, SCHEDULE_CONTENT, SCHEDULE_TYPE, TO_CHAR(START_DATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(END_DATE+1,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE FROM SCHEDULE WHERE SCHEDULE_TYPE = #{scheduleType} AND USER_NO = #{userNo} AND STATUS ='Y'
